EAWJ
Garou Densetsu Special

Enabler Code (Must Be On) [GMO]
2822DB7A 00000304
0222DB7A 00009999
E0000000 80008000
2822DB7A 00000303
0222DB7A 00009999
E0000000 80008000

Miscellaneous Codes

Unlimited Time [GMO]
2822DB7A 00009999
00220452 00000099
E0000000 80008000

P1 Unlimited Health [GMO]
2822DB7A 00009999
0221FFC2 00006060
E0000000 80008000

P1 Enable Play as Ryo [GMO]
2822DB7A 00009999
0022DB8B 000000FF
002219BB 00000010
E0000000 80008000
Ported from PS2 version

P2 Enable Play as Ryo [GMO]
2822DB7A 00009999
0022DB8B 000000FF
00221ABB 00000010
E0000000 80008000
Ported from PS2 version

00220452 00000061

0021FFC2 00006060

281EED00 FFFD0002

E0000000 80008000
